website_summaries.verdict: A well-priced, versatile set from a reliable company that's comfortable to use.
pros: Includes 3 B blades, for smaller, thinner areas
Comfortable rubberized handle also provides storage for blades
Extendable swivel-head design makes it easy to reach tight places
cons: No explanation of the material each blade is best for

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, 30 Day Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for a family member. I usually use Noga deburring tools, but went a little bit cheap and got burned. The first time i went to use it, the retaining collar fell off. I called Vargus (the parent company) about the warranty to get an exchange and inquire about the warranty (missing form their packaging, documentation and website). I was told by Vargus that i have to go through Amazon. Amazon only has a 30 day return period. So apparently the warranty from Vargus is only 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Atkin

customer_reviews.title: Very good low price deburring tool, just make sure yours isn't defective.
customer_reviews.text: My first one was defective, but Amazon replaced it and the second one has been great. the rubberized handle is very comfortable for deburring large or complex parts and the different tips have come in handy. I wish it said what each tip was specifically designed for, some have been obvious but others I haven't been so sure about.
customer_reviews.author: USAF Veteran

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day deburring pipe and assorted machined ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day deburring pipe and assorted machined parts. The blades are sharp and I'm suprised at the quality of the handle and the extension section. This is another solid little tool that makes it that much easier to get things finished at the shop. Will be buying another for the home shop soon!
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This tool comes with a set of bits / ends for different metals and edges. It also features storage in the handle and an extendable shaft to get into hard to reach areas. Lately I've seen a trend in affordable quality products from Israel and southern Europe. Keep up the good work guys.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The package clearly states that comes with eight items. I opened package and there is only two ! the blade seems dull and the grip of the handle is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Critic

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3D print cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Use it to clean up my 3D prints and it is very useful. Much easier and much less dangerous than my previous box cutter knife method.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of metal work at my job and I must say, I can't believe I haven't purchased this earlier. The grip is comfortable, the tool is well built, and it works like a boss.
customer_reviews.author: S. Faris

customer_reviews.title: A must have for tool box
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality a must have for any hobbiest or machinest.
customer_reviews.author: shipmag

customer_reviews.title: Not a single Burr will survive the might of this beast!
customer_reviews.text: Not a single Burr will survive the might of this beast! This beauty works wonders on your raw components, bringing them that much closer to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Good tool but the one one I got is defective
customer_reviews.text: Good product but there is 2 holes that fit 2 different size blades the smaller one is not a tight fit and the blade slips out on occasion. I would like to return it and try another one I think/hope this one is defective. But all in all good product the blades are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 3D printing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for 3D printing. Trims plastics very easily and precisely. Good and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for deburring 3D prints! Several bits are included and the bits swivel in the head to make it easy to reach hard to reach places!
customer_reviews.author: John Shadel

customer_reviews.title: Just love this deburning toolkit it more than met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just love this deburning toolkit it more than met my expectations. Nicely made, easy to use I am sure it will be around for many years to come
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: It's okay -- would have liked a deburring drill bit (which do exist
customer_reviews.text: It's okay -- would have liked a deburring drill bit (which do exist, you know), but with a little practice, these will do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyLeePM

customer_reviews.title: Great for Removing Sharp Edges
customer_reviews.text: This deburring tool is well constructed and works great. If you work with metal this is a must. It is quicker than a grinder and can get in to tight angles.
customer_reviews.author: Knowledgeable Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the dual tip! Will accept small and large blades!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Felt like I got had.
customer_reviews.text: The description and the item package both indicate 8 pieces per package. I received the handle and two blades. So 3 pcs in total. Would not recommend to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: marc courson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew what I was missing, I should have bought one of these a long time ago. ** watch your fingers...super sharp.** Owner of truck shop.
customer_reviews.author: aaron vandenbusch

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Because you can use either beburring blades, it's not very sturdy. Mine bent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the purchase. quality tool. Easy change blade mechanism. Ergonomic handle
customer_reviews.author: garra74

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable handle. Just needs a drop of oil on ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable handle. Just needs a drop of oil on the retention so the blades with swivel as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was needed to debar the holes drilled in the aluminum plate
customer_reviews.author: MrShay

customer_reviews.title: Too handy not to have
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and easy for metal working. No issues after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Darren R. Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: A must have when working with metal and need a easy tool to just debur the metal. works as described.
customer_reviews.author: why buy this?

customer_reviews.title: if you drill holes in metal, you should own one
customer_reviews.text: Every person who drills holes in metal should own a deburring tool. The master machinist I worked with showed me this almost without mention: just grabbed it, and zipped it around the hole. Don't worry about which one or which brand: I've never used one that *didn't* work. This one is nice because of the range of blades. For the n00bs: best finish from clockwise cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Mocky McMockface

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip handle with adjustable length shaft and easily changed ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip handle with adjustable length shaft and easily changed blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Chudd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: It deburs like you would want it to. Appears to be of decent quality. I have recently left the field service industry and no longer use it on a daily basis - just for personal use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Best feature is the extendable shaft for reaching down or into a project. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Randall P Patton

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: i didn't give it a five star because i haven't had it long enough, but i like the easy, quick change of heads feature, the blades are sharp (ah, there's one of the candidates for five stars, how long will it be before i need a replacement head?, we'll see), the handle is a comfortable grip, and the swivel of the head is smooth.It cuts brass easily enough. i was cutting some A513 just tonight, was a little harder of course but i was roughing the ID quickly just to debur it, and maybe a different head shape would have made a difference, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: flavien matheson

product_meta.title: SHAVIV 90094 Mango II Deburring Tool Kit M With Mango II Handle (8 Pieces)
product_meta.description:
The SHAVIV 151-90094 Mango II Deburring Tool Kit M includes one Mango II handle, one M blade holder, three B-series blades, and three E-series blades for long-reach deburring of hole edges and straight edges. The Mango II handle has an ergonomic design for comfort and control. The M blade holder is for long-reach work and holds SHAVIV B- and E-series blades.

The kit contains one each of B10, B20, and B30 high-speed steel blades. The B10 blade is designed for deburring straight edges and hole edges on steel, aluminum, copper, and plastic. The B20 blade is designed for deburring straight edges and hole edges on brass, cast iron, and plastic, and rotates clockwise as well as counterclockwise. The B30 blade simultaneously deburrs the inside and outside of holes up to 0.16" thick on steel, aluminum, copper, and plastic.

The kit also contains one each of E100, E111, and E200 high-speed steel blades. The E100 blade is designed for deburring straight edges and hole edges on steel, aluminum, copper, and plastic. The E111 blade is designed for deburring straight edges and edges of holes with a minimum 0.06" diameter on steel, aluminum, copper, and plastic. The E200 blade is designed for deburring straight edges and hole edges on brass, cast iron, and plastic. It rotates clockwise as well as counterclockwise.

Deburring cutters are hand tools used to remove sharp edges and small unwanted bumps, also known as burrs, from material. The cutter typically consists of two pieces: a handle and a blade. The handle holds a blade that is typically made from high-speed steel, carbide, or ceramic, and may have a coating to extend its life or for work on tougher materials. The blades have different designs for deburring in a range of applications, such as straight edges, hole edges, through-holes, slots, and corners. A blade holder can be connected to a handle to hold the blade for long-reach work.

Vargus manufactures cutting, grooving and deburring tools under the Vardex, Groovex, and SHAVIV brand names. The company, founded in 1960 and headquartered in Nahariya, Israel, meets International Organization for Standardization (ISO) standard 9001:2000.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 * (1) Mango II handle
 * (1) M blade holder
 * (1) B10 blade
 * (1) B20 blade
 * (1) B30 blade
 * (1) E100 blade
 * (1) E111 blade
 * (1) E200 blade
feature_bullets: Kit includes Mango II handle, M blade holder, three B-series blades, and three E-series blades for long-reach deburring of hole edges and straight edges
Mango II plastic handle has an ergonomic design for comfort and control
M style blade holder for long-reach work holds SHAVIV B- and E-series blades
B-series blades and E-series blades are made of high-speed steel for a broad range of materials

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
